manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OVERVIEW: LG TV Monitor has dual-purpose which combines TV and Computer Monitor, presents a new way of combining technology with lifestyle. HD Display HD resolution brings magnificent picture quality through outstanding color accuracy, visual contrast and sharpness. Wide Viewing Angle LG TV Monitor supports wide vertical and horizontal viewing angles with superb color accuracy. From sitting or standing, you can enjoy the same excellent image projection. WebOS 3.5 Smart TV WebOS 3.5 makes it convenient for you to find and enjoy your favorite content such as games and streaming service. And with easy-to-use magic remote*, you get to spend less time for searching and more time for enjoying. Built-in Wi-Fi Enjoy LG TV Monitor’s built-in Wi-Fi. Easy to connect with other devices, you no longer have to go through hassles of tedious connecting procedures to view contents from other devices on the monitor. So you can enjoy the smartphone’s contents on a big screen. 5W x 2 Stereo Speaker Enjoy your movies or games with realistic stereo sound. With the built in stereo speaker, there is no need for extra speakers around your monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely the WORST TV we have EVER Purchased
reviews.reviewText: OK, I've had this piece of crap LG TV now for a while ...AND, my opinion of this TV has only gotten WORSE. Absolutely the WORST TV EVER!!The delay after pushing a button is soooo long, that you begin to wonder if you actually pushed it hard enough. Sometimes, you push it again - which TOTALLY CONFUSES THE BLASTED TV!!Sometimes, you wait ...and it EVENTUALLY goes to where you pushed.GOOD HEAVENS, people. THIS TV is AWFUL!DO NOT BUY THIS TV !!!====================Wow, hard to begin on the BAD features of this LG TV.1. S-l-o-w and d-e-l-a-y-e-d response to ANY input; have to wait a few seconds for TV to respond; hard to know if TV is failing or 'thinking' about it :(2. The REMOTE control buttons are ALLLL wrong - with the mute button CENTER of remote (??!!) - NOT convenient or accessible.3. The REMOTE has the "SLEEP" button NO WHERE easily accessible - in fact, HARD to access it its location.I wouldn't buy another LG product JUST because of THIS TV and remote.The only reason it got a 2 overall rating (instead of 1) is because it IS a TV - that's it.
